categories: Category:Plants of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: The kallnut tree was a species of tree that was found on the Outer Rim planet Kaller. The tree's resilient hardwood was one of Kaller's major exports and, as a result, helped to drive much of the planet's economy.
The kallnut tree was mentioned in No Disintegrations, a 2017 sourcebook published by Fantasy Flight Games for use with its Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game.
